sectiondef.header: TLE9xxx.cpp - Arduino library to control Infineon's BLDC Motor Control Shield with Tle9xxx

description.para: This library includes the generic functions for TLE9xxx family tle9563corelib

Infineon Technologies AG
2021 Infineon Technologies AG
2.0.0
SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT

briefdescription.para: standard constructor with default pin assignment
standard destructor switches shield off
set the Interrupt Mask to select which events should cause a hardware pin interrupt generation

this function will be called if an an interrupt occured. It will first gather information about the error out of the Status information field. Depending on which bits are set there, the specific register values will be read for more information.
Print an Error message, if an interrupt occurs and TLE status register contains an error.

parameterdescription.para: hand over error code
address of the register, the error bit was set in
full content of the register, ther error bit was set in

briefdescription.para: read the Supply Voltage Fail Status register of the TLE and generate an ErrorCode depending of the fault-category

parameterdescription.para: returns the composed register address and content for detailed debugging

simplesect.para: DiagFlag return the generated Error code

briefdescription.para: read the Thermal Protection status register of the TLE and generate an ErrorCode depending of the fault-category

parameterdescription.para: returns the composed register address and content for detailed debugging

simplesect.para: DiagFlag return the generated Error code

briefdescription.para: read the High-Side Switch status register of the TLE and generate an ErrorCode depending of the fault-category

parameterdescription.para: returns the composed register address and content for detailed debugging

simplesect.para: DiagFlag return the generated Error code

briefdescription.para: read the Device Information status register of the TLE and generate an ErrorCode depending of the fault-category

parameterdescription.para: returns the composed register address and content for detailed debugging

simplesect.para: DiagFlag return the generated Error code

briefdescription.para: read the Drain-source overvoltage status register and generate an ErrorCode depending of the fault-category

parameterdescription.para: Adress of DSOV register
Content of DSOV register

simplesect.para: uint8_t DiagFlag return the generated Error code

briefdescription.para: initialize variables for the adaptive gate control algorithm
read out rise-time of TLE and store calculated value in a global variable
increase or decrease the charge current, depending on some conditions
set the precharge and pre-discharge time for all MOSFETs. This function sends two SPI commands.

parameterdescription.para: Precharge time
Pre-discharge time

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t ichgst1, uint8_t ichgst2, uint8_t ichgst3, uint8_t ichgst4)
memberdef.name: set_ST_ICHG

briefdescription.para: set the charge discharge current for static activation (no PWM).

parameterdescription.para: static charge and discharge currents on PHASE1
static charge and discharge currents on PHASE2
static charge and discharge currents on PHASE3
static charge and discharge currents on PHASE4

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t idchg, uint8_t ichg, bool ACTorFW, uint8_t hb)
memberdef.name: set_HB_ICHG

briefdescription.para: HB charge/discharge currents for PWM operation REF p.221 in TLE9562 datasheet.

parameterdescription.para: Discharge current of HBx active MOSFET
Charge current of HBx active MOSFET or charge and discharge current of HBx FW MOSFET
0 = active MOSFET, 1 = FW MOSFET
[0;3] which halfbridge should be changed

briefdescription.para: HM max. pre-charge/pre-discharge in PWM operation current and diagnostic pull-down.

parameterdescription.para: [0;1] Control of HBx off-state current source and current sink
[0;3] Maximum drive current of all HBs during the pre-charge phase and pre-discharge phases

briefdescription.para: HBx per-charge/pre-discharge initialization configuration in PWM operation.

parameterdescription.para: Initial predischarge current of HBx
Initial precharge current of HBx
Banking bits for Precharge and Predischarge Initial Current

briefdescription.para: HBx inouts TDON configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Turn-on delay time of active MOSFET of HBx
Banking bits for turn-on delay time

briefdescription.para: HBx TDOFF configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Tirn-off delay time of active MOSFET of HBx
Banking bits for turn-off delay time

briefdescription.para: Set the LS and HS VDS monitoring threshold.

parameterdescription.para: [0;7]drain-source overvoltage threshold for all HS and LS
[0;1] Deep Adaption
[0;3] Filter time of drain-source voltage moitoring

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t t_blank, uint8_t t_ccp, bool ACTorFW, uint8_t hb)
memberdef.name: set_CCP_BLK

briefdescription.para: Set the current protection times.

parameterdescription.para: set blank time
set cross current protection time
0 = active MOSFET, 1 = FW MOSFET
[0;3] which halfbridge should be changed

briefdescription.para: Reads out the MOSFET rise/fall time of the given PWM half-bridge.

parameterdescription.para: which halfbridge should be read [1-4]

briefdescription.para: disable the cyclic redundancy check of TLE9xxx

send SPI comands to the TLE9xxx If CRC is disabled, static pattern will be added automatically. TODO: insert another layer below writeReg, so this function can be used for SPI as well as for CAN and Lin

parameterdescription.para: addres of the register you want access (use the enum in TLE9xxx-reg.cpp)
data you want to transmitt (16-bit)

briefdescription.para: read SPI commands from TLE9xxx

parameterdescription.para: addres of the register you want to read from (use the enum in TLE9xxx-reg.cpp)

briefdescription.para: enum for the flags
Array of the calculated tRISEx EMAs for the different configured ICHGx.
Array of the calculated tFALLx EMAs for the different configured IDCHGx.
Current ICHGx with which the MOSFET driver is configured.
Current IDCHGx with which the MOSFET driver is configured.
Stores the "Status information field" which is the first byte of every SDO package.
Stores the value to be written.
If an error message was printed, this value will get 1, indicating an error occured.
virtual function definitions, will be declared in the inheritance sub-classes like Tle9563, Tle9562, ...
represents a basic TLE9xxx

detaileddescription.para: This class provides all generic, a TLE9xxx SBC is capable of. This mainly includes the the SPI read/wrtite functions, Cyclic redundancy check (CRC) setup and interrupt-error settings.
This class is not intended to be used directly. It should bequeath its generic functions to a derived class that adds the virtual defined functions related to a specific SBC.
